            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Value = '';
                        $id = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' );
                        if( $id != '0' )
                        {
                              $PackageName = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'access_package_name' );
                              $PackageVersion = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'access_package_version' , 'last' );
                              $PackageObject = get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , __FILE__ );
                        
                              $Record = call_user_func( array( $PackageObject , 'get_by_id' ) , $id );
                              
                              $Field = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'field' );
                              $Value = get_field( $Record , $Field );
                        }
                        
                        return( $Value );
                  }

Definition at line 93 of file db_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; ( $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'query_field' , 
                                          array( 'field' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'query' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ) !== false ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              $Result = $this->Database->query( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'query' ) );
                              $Result = $this->Database->fetch_results( $Result );
                              if( isset( $Result[ 0 ] ) )
                              {
                                    $Result = $Result[ 0 ];
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    throw( new Exception( "No data found for the query \"$Query\"" ) );
                              }
                              
                              $Value = get_field( $Result , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'field' ) );
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{query_field:$MacroParameters}" , $Value , $ProcessingString );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

                        for( ; ( $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'record_field' , 
                                          array( 'access_package_name' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'field' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 
                                          'access_package_version' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'id' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ) !== false ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              
                              $Value = $this->get_record_field( $this->BlockSettings );
